comment: Forget attempting to make sense of her lectures and forget taking notes. *Study the chapters* in and out of class. Do all the homework: it's extra credit, the only thing that saved my grade. Keep your tests and study them for the final, which is all taken straight from the tests. Very nice lady, but godawful teacher. Insanely hard for a math class.
Read all the comments they are all true~~I hate this cuz it really brought down my GPA and I am really good at Math. DONT EVER TAKE HER~~

She is a decent teacher. She speaks in broken english and is hard to understand. The worst part on the tests are that you dont explain the answer enough. It can be a multiple choice answer and you get it right but she will count it wrong because you didnt explain. If you do get this class make sure you EXPLAIN EVERYTHING IN DETAIL!

She's nice enough, but out of my class that started with over 50, 7 passed and 3 ppl got higher than a C. Tests suck. Not because you have the answers wrong, but because she KILLS your grade by taking off 4 pts here and 3 pts there for random things. It can be right, but she "won't like how you solved it". I say horrible prof, tho I managed an A.
She's sweet, but she's horrible at teaching. I made A+ in all math classes in high school and am not passing college algebra.
This teacher was hard to understand. She quizzed us on homework we hadn't turned in yet and was rarely any help when you asked a question.

I wish I read the reviews here before I picked up her class. She is very bad at teaching. She doesn't know how to answer questions from students, mostly because she is not very fluent in English. I have no idea what she is looking for on tests. I could go on but room is limited. She needs to be removed, she is a disgrace to KSU. Do not take her cla

Wow avoid taking this class im surprised shes still teaching at ksu. She does not tell you what she wants on the tests so most of its guess work and then youll get the problem wrong anyways because you thought it was simple enough and didnt write a paragraph explaining it. After the first test half the class dropped luckly i only have 12 hours :(

GET HER OUT OF KENNESAW, she doesn't speak english and her writing is incomprehensible. she'll start problems on the board then switch the variables and negative symbols halfway through then not finish the problem. she picks random questions from the homework and grades for correctness. she pretends not to understand you so she wont have to answer

PLEASE DON'T TAKE THIS CLASS, YOU WILL BE HAPPY YOU DIDN'T. OVER HALF MY CLASS DROPPED AS WELL INCLUDING ME. EVERYTHING THE PREVIOUS POSTS SAID WAS TRUE. SHE HAS AN ATTITUDE, SHE CAN'T SPEAK ENGLISH. THE UNIVERSITY SHOULD REALLY LOOK INTO FIND A REPLACEMENT FOR HER!

Holy cow. I am an accent enthusiast. However, this woman was switching english words within her sentences and constantly correcting herself. She has choppy speech patterns that you can't comprehend without squinting at her mouth hoping to catch some movement that might reveal what she's saying. Elementray teaching methods. Could not learn a thing.
No relevancy what so ever. Worst teacher ever. I felt like my elementary teachers could teach way better than she could.I recommend dropping this class if you get her.

PLEASE DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!! she is the worst teacher I have ever had. I was very good at alegbra before I took this class now I am struggling a lot with everything she gives up. When you ask questions she acts like you should already know the answer. It is very hard to understand her.
Worst teacher ever. It's college algebra and almost everyone fails the tests and there is no way to contact her about class etc. She doesnt give you her email or a phone number. DO NOT TAKE HER!

Worst teacher that I have ever had in my learning years. Completely unorganized with grading. She has horrible teaching style with almost impossible to read hand writing. Always becomes confusing to understand since her English is honestly horrible. I and all other classmates become frustrated while lectures since notes are useless while doing HW.
